  • Constructor Details

    • Knight

      public Knight(String color, String name)
      constructor calls the superclass Piece constructor to assign color and name to each piece
      Parameters:
      color - The piece can have color "w" for white, or "b" for black
      name - The abbreviated name of the piece: "N" for Knight

  • Method Details

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove(int sRow, int sCol, int dRow, int dCol, Board board, Piece prevMove, int[] CoordOfPrevMove)
      Checks to see if the piece can move to a given tile with the passed in coordinates.
      Specified by:
      canMove in class Piece
      Parameters:
      sRow - Row of starting Tile in the board array
      sCol - Column of starting Tile in the board array
      dRow - Row of destination Tile in the board array
      dCol - Column of destination Tile in the board array
      board - instance of the game board that the game is being played on
      prevMove - The piece that was moved last turn
      CoordOfPrevMove - starting row and column of the previous move
      Returns:
      true if move is possible with given coordinates for a Knight, false otherwise

    • isPathClear

      public boolean isPathClear(int sRow, int sCol, int dRow, int dCol, Board board)
      Checks to see if there are any blocking pieces in the path of the piece that is trying to be moved.
      Specified by:
      isPathClear in class Piece
      Parameters:
      sRow - Row of starting Tile in the board array
      sCol - Column of starting Tile in the board array
      dRow - Row of destination Tile in the board array
      dCol - Column of destination Tile in the board array
      board - instance of the game board that the game is being played on
      Returns:
      true if the path is clear, false otherwise
